00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 
00043 #ifndef PIZ_KOHONEN_MAP_H
00044 #define PIZ_KOHONEN_MAP_H
00045 
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 
00049 #include "pizDataStructures.h"
00050 
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 /**
00055  * \details This is a \a ONE dimension self-organizing map.
00056  * \remark  Implemented simply with an array.
00057  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00058  */
00059  
00060 typedef struct _PIZKohonenMap {
00061     long            mapSize;                /* Number of nodes in the Kohonen map. */
00062     long            vectorSize;             /* Size of node's vector.*/
00063     long            count;                  /* Number of learning iterations performed. */
00064     long            range;                  /* Neighborhood influence. */
00065     long            training;               /* Number of learning iterations planned. */
00066     double          step;                   /* Learning step. */
00067     double          *map;                   /* The data. */
00068     } PIZKohonenMap;
00069 
00070 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 
00073 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00074 
00075 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * \brief   Create the Kohonen map.
00080  * \details The function accepts two arguments, the size of the map, and the size of the vectors.
00081  *          For the map, maximum is 100, default is 20.
00082  *          For the vectors, maximum is 256, default is 4.
00083  *          In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00084  * \param   argc The number of arguments.
00085  * \param   argv A pointer to arguments.
00086  * \return  A pointer to the new Kohonen map.
00087  * \remark  The following shows how to create a Kohonen map.  
00088  * \code
00089  * long args[2] = {50, 8};
00090  *
00091  * PIZKohonenMap *map = pizKohonenMapNew (2, &args);
00092  * PIZKohonenMap *map = pizKohonenMapNew (0, NULL); // default values
00093  *
00094  * \endcode
00095  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00096  */
00097 PIZKohonenMap *pizKohonenMapNew (long argc, long *argv);
00098 
00099 /**
00100  * \brief   Free the Kohonen map.
00101  * \details It is safe to pass NULL pointer. 
00102  * \param   x A Pointer.
00103  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00104  */
00105 void pizKohonenMapFree (PIZKohonenMap *x);
00106 
00107 /**
00108  * \brief   Add values to the Kohonen map.
00109  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00110  * \param   argc The number of values.
00111  * \param   argv A pointer to the values.
00112  * \return  An error code.
00113  * \remark  Values provided are clipped [0, 127].
00114  *          The Kohonen map continue to learn even when the number of learnings planned is reached.
00115  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00116  */
00117 PIZError pizKohonenMapAdd (PIZKohonenMap *x, long argc, long *argv);
00118 
00119 /**
00120  * \brief   Clear the Kohonen map.
00121  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00122  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00123  */
00124 void pizKohonenMapClear (PIZKohonenMap *x);
00125 
00126 /**
00127  * \brief   Fill a given array with Kohonen map values.
00128  * \remark  A node is randomly drawn, and the array filled with values from the vector. 
00129  *          If the array is longer than the vector, values are copied again.
00130  * \param   argc Number of values to proceed.
00131  * \param   argv Pointer to the array to fill.
00132  * \return  An error code.
00133  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00134  */
00135 PIZError pizKohonenMapProceed (const PIZKohonenMap *x, long argc, long *argv);
00136 
00137 /**
00138  * \brief   Get the number of learnings currently performed.
00139  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00140  * \return  The number of learnings.
00141  * \ingroup kohonenMap
00142  */
00143 long pizKohonenMapCount (const PIZKohonenMap *x);
